channel.title: Agents on Poke
channel.description: Recent content in Agents on Poke

item.title: Agents
item.description: Agents are operators which create metrics from your websites at regular interval. In addition, they create metrics by zone where the agent is deployed. A zone is a concept affiliated to the team or enterprise whom deploy agents. Generally, each agent is deployed on each zone used by the team or enterprise. HTTP The HTTP agent scrapes your websites in order to extract the response status and time. This agent emulates the user’s traffic.
